element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm performs a Shapiro-Wilk normality test on the values of a given variable in a vector layer

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The field that contains the variable to analyze

element.name: RESULT
element.text:
The resulting value (W) of the normality test.
If W is too small, the null hypothesis (the sample came for a normally distributed population) may be rejected.
